name: The Target
description:
Made by iLL_Pazzo and DMMCe for the Stranger Jam.

Game design, art, animations : iLL_Pazzo

Programing : DMMCe   ITCH Account :  https://itch.io/profile/dmmce

Music : Kevin Macleod

You have to find your target or you will kill an innocent people. Every 15 seconds you'll have a hint about your target.

Plays with mouse only :

Left click to shoot

Mouse wheel up/down to zoom in/out

Right click to mark a target
